import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import logo from './estrela.png'; import Axios from "axios" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" const Navbar = () => { const [loginStatus, setLoginStatus] = useState(false) const [username, setUsername] = useState("") Axios.defaults.withCredentials = true; const logout = () => { Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/logout", {}).then((response) => { setLoginStatus(false) navigate('../..') }) } useEffect(() => { Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/isUserAuth", { }).then((response) => { if(response.data.auth == true) { setUsername(response.data.user[0].Nome) setLoginStatus(true) } }) }, []) if (loginStatus == false) { return (

  • Os melhores jogos
  • Os jogos mais recentes
  • Registar
  • Login
) } else { return (

) } } export default Navbar
